switch.name: position/wow
switch.test: gear/unit[0]/WOW eq 1 gear/unit[1]/WOW eq 1 gear/unit[2]/WOW eq 1

switch.name: fbw/mla/switch-aileron
switch.test: /controls/flight/elevator le 0.5 /accelerations/pilot-gdamped ge 2.0 /instrumentation/airspeed-indicator/indicated-speed-kt ge 249.5 /controls/flight/flap-pos eq 0 fbw/mla/switch-fbw eq 1

switch.name: fbw/mla/switch-speedbrake
switch.test: /controls/flight/elevator le 0.5 /accelerations/pilot-gdamped ge 2.0 /instrumentation/airspeed-indicator/indicated-speed-kt ge 249.5 /controls/flight/flap-pos eq 0 fbw/mla/switch-fbw eq 1

pid.name: fbw/pitch/vc-kts-rate
pid.descripton: Use D only to calculate rate of IAS

switch.name: fbw/pitch/e-i-s
switch.test: fbw/fmgc/enabled eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft le 50 /controls/flight/flap-pos ge 4 /controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle lt 0.65 /controls/engines/engine[1]/throttle lt 0.65 /FMGC/status/to-state eq 0 /it-fbw/law eq 0 position/wow eq 0

fbw/fmgc/enabled eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft le 50 /controls/flight/flap-pos ge 4 /controls/engines/engine[0]/throttle lt 0.65 /controls/engines/engine[1]/throttle lt 0.65 /FMGC/status/to-state eq 0 /it-fbw/law eq 0 gear/unit[0]/WOW eq 0 fbw/pitch/flare-gear-switch eq 1

switch.name: fbw/elevator-output
switch.test: fbw/fmgc/enabled eq 1 position/wow eq 1 gear/unit[0]/WOW eq 0

switch.name: fbw/pitch/autotrim-switch
switch.test: fbw/pitch/gain-switch eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft ge fbw/pitch/autotrim-height attitude/roll-rad lt 0.628319 attitude/roll-rad gt -0.628319 fbw/pitch/pid-switched ge 0.01 fbw/pitch/g-instrumented ge 0.5 /it-fbw/protections/overspeed ne 1 /controls/flight/elevator-trim le 0.32 position/wow eq 0

fbw/pitch/gain-switch eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft ge fbw/pitch/autotrim-height attitude/roll-rad lt 0.628319 attitude/roll-rad gt -0.628319 fbw/pitch/pid-switched le -0.01 fbw/pitch/g-instrumented ge 0.5 /it-fbw/protections/overspeed ne 1 /controls/flight/elevator-trim ge -1.0 position/wow eq 0

switch.name: fbw/yaw/slip-skid
switch.test: position/wow eq 1 fbw/yaw/rudder-nul gt 0 fbw/yaw/rudder-nul lt 0

switch.name: fbw/yaw/tc-pd-s
switch.test: position/wow eq 1 fbw/yaw/rudder-nul gt 0 fbw/yaw/rudder-nul lt 0

switch.name: hydraulics/tiller/hyd-pwr
switch.test: position/wow eq 1 hydraulics/tiller/elec-pwr eq 1 /systems/hydraulic/yellow-psi ge 1500 /sim/model/autopush/connected eq 0 /controls/gear/nws-switch eq 1 /engines/engine[0]/state eq 3
position/wow eq 1 hydraulics/tiller/elec-pwr eq 1 /systems/hydraulic/yellow-psi ge 1500 /sim/model/autopush/connected eq 0 /controls/gear/nws-switch eq 1 /engines/engine[1]/state eq 3
